mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment( prod_code, emp_code, pay_type, pay_price, pay_time ) VALUES ( #{prodCode}, #{empCode}, #{payType}, #{payPrice}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT payment.prod_code prodCode, product.prod_content prodName, emp_code empCode, pay_type payType, pay_price payPrice, pay_time payTime FROM payment JOIN product ON payment.prod_code = product.prod_code WHERE emp_code = #{empCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment WHERE emp_code = #{empCode}
